ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'What about the previous generations?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (The Pharaoh) said: "And what about the former generations?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Pharaoh asked: "Then, what is the state of the former generations?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He then asked, "What do you know about the past generations?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Said Firaun, “What is the state of the former generations?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: [Fir`awn] said: "What about the generations of old"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Then what is the state of the former generations?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Pharaoh said, 'And what of the former generations?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: What then is the state of the generations of old?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Pharaoh asked, "What about the previous generations?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: then what happened to the former generations?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘What about the former generations?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Pharaoh) said: "What then is the condition of previous generations?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: [Fir'aun (Pharaoh)] said: "What about the generations of old?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He (Pharaoh) asked: 'How was it then, with the former generations'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “What about the first generations?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Pharaoh] said, "Then what is the case of the former generations?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:51] He, Pharaoh, said, ‘So what of, the status [of], the generations, the communities, of old?’, such as the people of Noah, Hūd, Lot and Sālih, with regard to their having worshipped graven images.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Pharaoh said to Moses: (What then is the state of the generations of old?) What is the events of the people of old? How did they perish?
